com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords - package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords
Provides classes for kicking off the application and integrating the application code.
com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.config - package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.config
Contains classes related to application configuration
com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter - package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter
Contains classes which are responsible for eventually converting the number into mapping word combinations.
com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary - package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary
Contains classes which are primarily responsible for the creation and population of the dictionary.
com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers - package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers
Contains tranformer contract and other generic transformers which are used to tranform raw numbers and words into words used by dictionary and number converters.
com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.util - package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.util
Contains Utility classes with static methods.
Configuration - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.config
 
convertNumber(String) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter.NumberConverterAlgorithm
Utility method which takes the number string whose matching combinations are to be found, and returns the matching combinations.
Lot of unit testing for this class can be covered by writing Unit tests against this method.
convertNumbers(List<Stream<String>>, Consumer<TransformerContainer<Set<String>>>) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter.NumbersConverter

createAndPopulateDictionary(List<Stream<String>>) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.ApplicationFacade
 
createAndPopulateDictionary(List<Stream<String>>) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.DictionaryFactory
Iterates through each dictionary source and then each element of the dictionary, and then transforms it to a number, and the combination of word and number are stored in the dictionary
Presently this is single threaded but it can be overriden to make it multi-threaded and at the same time the dictionary implementaion has to be made thread safe
createDictionary() - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.DictionaryFactory
Abstract factory method to create the dictionary, based on the implementation used in the Subclass
createDictionary() - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.HashBasedDictionaryFactory
Implementation of the factory method to instantiate a concrete dictionary class

D

Dictionary - Interface in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary
This is an interface which defines the contract for storing dictionary words and their number transformations and retrieving them.
DictionaryFactory - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary
Abstract class which parses each word of a each dictionary source, applies validation and transformation on each word, then converts that word to a number and stores that the number representation of the word and the word itself in the dictionary.
DictionaryFactory(InputTransformer<String>) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.DictionaryFactory
Constructs a container object which would be later used to create and populate the dictionary

flipInput() - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.TransformerContainer
Utility method which would set TransformerContainer.transformed as TransformerContainer.input so that the same object can be piped to a different transformer.
Chose to flip the input rather than creating a new container object so that the errors are not lost.

N

NumberConverterAlgorithm - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter
This is the one of the core class which is fed with the dictionary and converts a number to a set of matching word combinations.
The algorithm uses a combination of recursive and iterative approach.
NumberConverterAlgorithm(InputTransformer<String>, Dictionary) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter.NumberConverterAlgorithm
Constructor to chain it with a parent transformer and initialize with the dictionary which is to be used.
NumberConverterAlgorithm(Dictionary) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter.NumberConverterAlgorithm
Initializes with the dictionary to be used for searching matching combinations.
NumbersConverter - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter
It accepts multi please streams of numbers and sequentially converts each number to a word combination.
NumbersConverter(InputTransformer<Set<String>>) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter.NumbersConverter
Initializes with the Number Converter Algorithm object which is used to find matching word combinations for each number string
NumbersEncodingParser - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary
This is a utility class which by default parses an internal file containing the number encoding and stores the encoding as a map, which can be retrieved later.

It has two constructors the no-arg one would parse an internal file which has the default encoding.
NumbersEncodingParser() - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.NumbersEncodingParser
No-arg constructor which would parse an internal encoding file and create the mapping.
Parsing is done as a part of the constructor so that when the method NumbersEncodingParser.getCharToDigitEncoding() the encoding map is available
NumbersEncodingParser(InputStreamReader) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.NumbersEncodingParser
Creates an encoding map from an external mapping source
numberValidRegex() - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.config.Configuration

StringUtil() - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.util.StringUtil
 
StripAndValidateInput - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers
A transformer class which would strip the unwanted characters from the input, and validate if it contains desired characters only.
Ex- If the rule says to strip whitespaces and punctuations from the numbers and dictionary words, then corresponding StripAndValidateInput.stripCharsPattern is provided to do the same.
Once the unwanted characters are removed, StripAndValidateInput.validCharsPattern is used to verify if only desired characters remain
StripAndValidateInput(String, String) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.StripAndValidateInput
Pre-compiles the regular expressions for striping unwanted characters and verifying if only desired characters remain
stripCharactersRegex() - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.config.Configuration
 

T

toString() - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.TransformerContainer
 
transform(TransformerContainer<Set<String>>) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter.NumberConverterAlgorithm
Applies any pre-massaging to be done on the number string, and then searches for all the matching combinations.
transform(TransformerContainer<T>) - Method in interface com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.InputTransformer
Method whose implementation would transform and validate(if required) a given input
transform(TransformerContainer<String>) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.StripAndValidateInput
Transforms or returns the errors based on the regular expressions provided
transform(TransformerContainer<String>) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.UpperCaseTransformer
 
transform(TransformerContainer<String>) - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.WordToNumberConverter
Transforms a given word,after applying transformation from a parent transformer, to a number based on the number encoding.
Furthermore, if there is a parent transformer applied, then the word generated by it is set as the input to argument numberTransformerContainer.
Since that is the word which would be stored in the dictionary.
TransformerContainer<T> - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers
It is a generic container class of the below different transformations that happen now in converting numbers to a word combination.
TransformerContainer(String) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.TransformerContainer
Constructs an inital empty object for an input which is being transformed

U

UpperCaseTransformer - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers
Decorator class which transforms an input string to upper case If there is a parentTransformer provided then first it would use that to do the first level of transformation.
UpperCaseTransformer() - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.UpperCaseTransformer
No-arg constructor, so that it can be used in isolation as well to convert a string to upper case
UpperCaseTransformer(InputTransformer<String>) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.UpperCaseTransformer
Constructs with a parent transformer whose output is piped to this class

W

wordConcatenateDelimitter() - Method in class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.config.Configuration
 
WordToNumberConverter - Class in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary
Transforms a word to a number based on the number encoding used to be stored in the dictionary.
This particular class handles supplementary characters, if there is any in the word, and expects a corresponding mapping provided in the number encoding.
Ex-> For the below sample encoding, the word CALL and ME gets converted to 2255 and 63 respectively.
A,B,C -> 2
D,E,F -> 3
G,H,I -> 4
J,K,L -> 5
M,N,O -> 6
P,Q,R,S -> 7
T,U,V -> 8
W,X,Y,Z -> 9

WordToNumberConverter(Map<String, String>) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.WordToNumberConverter
Creates an object with numbersEncodingMap which would be used to convert word to number
WordToNumberConverter(InputTransformer<String>, Map<String, String>) - Constructor for class com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.WordToNumberConverter
Creates an object with numbersEncodingMap and parentTransformer which would be used to convert word to number
